mapper.update: INSERT INTO post(user_id, created_at, title, content, visit_count, like_count, hate_count, reply_count) VALUES(#{userId}, #{createdAt}, #{title}, #{content}, #{visitCount}, #{likeCount}, #{hateCount}, #{replyCount})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS 'post_id', p.user_id AS 'post_user_id', u.nickname AS 'post_writer', p.created_at AS 'post_created_at', p.title AS 'post_title', p.content AS 'post_content', p.visit_count AS 'post_visit_count', p.like_count AS 'post_like_count', p.hate_count AS 'post_hate_count', p.reply_count AS 'post_reply_count', pm.id AS 'post_media_id', pm.type AS 'post_media_type', pm.url AS 'post_media_url', t.id AS 'tag_id', t.name AS 'tag_name' FROM (SELECT * FROM post ORDER BY visit_count DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}) AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN post_media pm ON pm.post_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag pt ON pt.post_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON t.id = pt.tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON u.id = p.user_id

SELECT p.id AS 'post_id', p.user_id AS 'post_user_id', u.nickname AS 'post_writer', p.created_at AS 'post_created_at', p.title AS 'post_title', p.content AS 'post_content', p.visit_count AS 'post_visit_count', p.like_count AS 'post_like_count', p.hate_count AS 'post_hate_count', p.reply_count AS 'post_reply_count', pm.id AS 'post_media_id', pm.type AS 'post_media_type', pm.url AS 'post_media_url', t.id AS 'tag_id', t.name AS 'tag_name' FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN post_media pm ON pm.post_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag pt ON pt.post_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON t.id = pt.tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.id = #{postId}
